en.today: Subtle messages from beyond may seep into your dreamworld early this morning, dear Aries, as the Sagittarius moon aspects Saturn, the nodes of fate, and the sun. Jot down any epiphanies that find you once you've awakened, allowing the secrets of your psyche to reveal themselves. You'll shift into work mode easily once Luna enters Capricorn, allowing you to focus on responsibilities and goals devotedly. However, you may struggle to translate your visions at times while Neptune and Mercury become restless. Rather than forcing half-baked dreams, use this time to play in hypotheticals so you can strategize and win.

Meanwhile, Mercury and Neptune stir amongst the stars, revealing new layers of the imagination.

kh.today: សំលេងរំខាននៅខាងក្រៅអាចនាំឱ្យគេងមិនស្រួលក្នុងអំឡុងពេលដំបូងបំផុត, Taurling Taurus, ដូចជាផ្នែកព្រះច័ន្ទ Sagittarius, ថ្នមៗថ្នាំង, ថ្នាំងនៃវាសនានិងព្រះអាទិត្យ isies ។ពិចារណាផ្តល់ជូនខ្លួនអ្នកនូវភាពស្ងប់ស្ងាត់មួយចំនួននៃភាពស្ងប់ស្ងាត់នៅពេលភ្ញាក់ឡើងដោយដាក់ពេលវេលាអេក្រង់ឱ្យបានយូរតាមដែលអាចធ្វើទៅបាន។វានឹងមានភាពស្រស់ស្អាតជាច្រើនដើម្បីអបអរសាទរនៅពេលដែល Luna ចូល Capricorn ធ្វើឱ្យផ្ទះព្រះច័នរបស់អ្នកសកម្ម។ថាមពលនេះជួយអ្នកឱ្យមើលឃើញពិភពលោកពីកែវថតអាថ៌កំបាំងកាន់តែច្រើននាំឱ្យអ្នកចូលកាន់តែជិតនឹងព្រះនិងបំណងប្រាថ្នារបស់អ្នក។ទន្ទឹមនឹងនេះដែរបារតនិងណេបតុនជំរុញឱ្យស្ថិតក្នុងចំណោមផ្កាយដែលបង្ហាញពីស្រទាប់ថ្មីនៃការស្រមើលស្រមៃ។

en.today: You may find it difficult to fully melt into slumber early this morning, sweet Gemini, as the Sagittarius moon aspects Saturn, the nodes of fate, and the sun. Take a few moments to practice self-care in order to recover from any sleep you missed out on. Your emotions intensify as Luna migrates into Capricorn, putting you in an all-or-nothing headspace. Though you will be eager to secure deals or commitments, give others space to find a conclusion if they need time to think. Try not to overanalyze social situations, and don't believe everything you hear or read when Mercury and Neptune grow agitated.
